descripcion: The soft, lightweight Cashco construction of this long-sleeved shirt creates the perfect backdrop for its stylish navy and black checkered pattern. In addition, it makes its color stand out to the maximum thanks to the saturated effect it causes. This shirt is finished with an English collar.

Update your business wardrobe with the aqua green pure cotton jersey long-sleeved shirt. Cotton jersey is perfect for busy days, thanks to its soft and breathable qualities. This rich color shirt is designed with a one-piece collar.

High contrast ivory white and black checks embellish the Cashco long sleeve shirt. The luxurious blend of warm cashmere and lightweight cotton gives the garment its soft, plush texture. It fastens with practical press studs.
Made from a natural, lightweight fabric, the short-sleeved shirt in pure linen comes in a delicate light beige. This short sleeve shirt is finished with a one-piece collar and hand-stitched details.

Update your business wardrobe with the yellow pure cotton jersey long-sleeved shirt. Cotton jersey is perfect for busy days, thanks to its soft and breathable qualities. This rich color shirt is designed with a one-piece collar.

The navy blue Jogger pants are made of High Performance™ cotton and wool, an exclusive Zegna fabric that is very breathable and comfortable. These Jogger pants feature a drawstring waistband for a perfect fit and stylish leather details.

Slim style meets innovative fabrics in these tailored navy pants, made with High Performance™ wool, an ultra-breathable, durable, comfortable and year-round wool fabric. Thanks to their construction, these dress pants are a perfect wardrobe staple.
Made from pure linen, a breathable fabric, these ivory white shorts are the perfect option for casual plans. The shorts feature a folded hem. Adjustable laces complement its loose fit.

These light blue garment-dyed stretch cotton Roccia pants give you a slim fit without sacrificing comfort. Its classic design is perfect for a casual set of clothing. Double belt loops finish this model.

The Mohair pants come in stretch cotton gabardine, beige in color and with a slim fit. This model lengthens the lines of the legs and thus elegantizes any of your outfits. These garment-dyed pants have a button fastening.

The Ghiaccio quilted jacket in white Oasi Cashmere features one of Zegna is most refined fabrics. The fine fabric is reimagined the fine quilted jacket designed for the new era of work and leisure. Decorated with a mandarin collar and a detachable hood, the white Ghiaccio jacket is also waterproof.

The Cima Hooded Coat, Navy Blue, is made from Zegna is innovative fabric, Oasi Cashmere Elements, which is made up of exclusive cashmere and a waterproof membrane, making it resistant to inclement weather. Its smooth finish gives it an elegant style ready for your adventures.

This navy blue sartorial overcoat is made from Zegna is exclusive fabric, Oasi Cashmere; an elegant option as a coat. It comes in a classic color so that the quality of its construction takes on greater prominence. Minimalist details complement its slim fit.

This navy bomber jacket is made from one of Zegna is most innovative fabrics, Trofeo™ Elements, which is composed of wool fibers and a waterproof membrane to create a soft, lightweight garment that is resistant to inclement weather.

This hooded ski jacket is made of black Oasi Cashmere Elements and features a breathable technical membrane that makes it waterproof without adding weight. The extra-fine fibers of Zegna cashmere give it a luxurious and soft finish.

The navy stretch rayon braided belt reimagines a classic design with contemporary materials and details. Updated with an ultra-black enamel finish, the iconic Triple Stitch™ buckle connects the accessory to a long tradition of luxurious Italian craftsmanship.

The rich textures of the Luxury Leisurewear belt collection will elegantize your casual models with refined materials and elegant metal finishes. The most versatile model in the line: this dark gray suede belt has a vicuña-colored nubuck lining, as well as a one-size-fits-all construction for greater comfort.

The wine-colored Oasi Cashmere baseball cap is made from Zegna is signature cashmere fibers and is complemented by a soft cashmere-blend lining. The Zegna 232 Road Brand Mark label on the back and the metallic Zegna logo finish this model.
The purple Oasi Cashmere scarf reflects Zegna is ethical vision for natural fabrics. The brand is precious cashmere lends its original finish to this accessory presented in a distinguished color.

The Black Silk Party Tie is made from pure Mulberry silk and is designed to complement your most elegant suits. The simple construction of this elegant tie fully reveals the shine that comes from its natural construction.
